page.title: 15GHOST STORIES (CONT.)
page.content: Another time in the same hotel an old man checked in and was given the key to room no.7.This man wasn't feeling well but went up into the room with his cases.That night,feeling very ill, he needed a drink.A maid carrying a candle and dressed in Tudor clothes came in with a cup of water.The next morning the man offered his thanks for the water brought during the night but no-one in the hotel knew what he was talking about. There is a place that is known as {Suicide Corner}. A young mother, who lived in a house on that corner, was feeling very depressed and she shot herself, leaving her young baby unattended. Soon it started to cry of hunger but no-one came and at last the poor baby died. People claim that they can hear its sad cries and some even say that they have seen the mother.
